testCases.label: Verify range_with_stop generates a list from 0 to stop-1
testCases.description: Checks that range_with_stop(5) returns the list [0, 1, 2, 3, 4]. This lab exercise tests the range_with_stop function's ability to generate a sequence starting from 0 up to, but not including, the stop value.

testCases.label: Verify range_with_start_stop generates a list from start to stop-1
testCases.description: Checks that range_with_start_stop(2, 7) returns the list [2, 3, 4, 5, 6]. This lab exercise tests the range_with_start_stop function's ability to generate a sequence starting from a specific start value up to, but not including, the stop value.

testCases.label: Verify range_with_start_stop_step generates a list with a specified step
testCases.description: Checks that range_with_start_stop_step(1, 10, 2) returns the list [1, 3, 5, 7, 9]. This lab exercise tests the range_with_start_stop_step function's ability to generate a sequence with a given start, stop, and step.
